short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful extension that helps you quickly find relevant information and get concise summaries of online articles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never be left wondering about unfamiliar topics or entities again. This extension lets you highlight any text on a webpage and quickly access relevant news articles with concise summaries.

As you surf the web, whether it's forums, social media, or any site, simply highlight words you want more context on and click the extension button. We'll find pertinent news coverage and provide easy-to-read summaries right there.

Stay informed without leaving the page or doing separate searches. Get the context you need seamlessly integrated into your browsing experience. Satisfy your curiosity and deepen your understanding with this handy news lookup tool.

Gain access to the functionality within our extension by completing a secure payment.
